description: PHP MogileFS is a client library to communicate with MogileFS trackers. Those trackers are part of the distributed filesystem MogileFS created by Danga Interactive (http://www.danga.com/) and used in serveral large scale projects like LiveJournal.
name: mogilefs

0.9.2.releaseNotes:
- Always URL-decode response from tracker (patch by Andre Pascha <andre.pascha@kwick.de>)
- Allow PHP 5.4

0.9.1.releaseNotes: - New method MogileFs::fileInfo(string $key) contributed by Jan Kantert (jan.kantert@researchgate.net)

0.9.0.releaseNotes:
- Adding new methods setReadTimeout(float readTimeout) and getReadTimeout()
- Remove PHP max version limit
- Comply with stricter c99 standard
- Fixed tests and made them more robust
- Optimized mogilefs_sock_read() and introduced maximum message size (based on a patch from Andre Pascha of kwick.de)
- MogileFs::put() throws more exceptions

0.8.1.releaseNotes: - Connect timeout does not set read timeout

0.7.5.releaseNotes:
- Allow compilation with PHP 5.3.X
- Fixed build issue on Mac OS X. Now compiles fine with neon from fink
- Checking return value of asprintf()

0.7.5RC1.releaseNotes:
- Fixed a number of memory leaks/invalid reads. PECL mogilefs is now leak free
- Fixed protos

0.7.5b7.releaseNotes:
- 5.3 compatibility for ARG_INFO definition (ZEND_BEGIN_ARG_INFO with implicit static)
- http://pecl.php.net/bugs/bug.php?id=15284: Invalid format string
- http://pecl.php.net/bugs/bug.php?id=15283: Invalid comparison with string literal (patch by crrodriguez@opensuse.org)
- Refactored retrieval of the default domain to use new mogilefs_get_default_domain()
- QA fixes for really strict compiler options
- Removed unused artefacts from earlier version like module globals and RINIT

0.7.5b6.releaseNotes:
- 5.3 compatibility for ARG_INFO definition (ZEND_BEGIN_ARG_INFO with implicit static)
- http://pecl.php.net/bugs/bug.php?id=15284: Invalid format string
- http://pecl.php.net/bugs/bug.php?id=15283: Invalid comparison with string literal (patch by crrodriguez@opensuse.org)
- Refactored retrieval of the default domain to use new mogilefs_get_default_domain()

0.7.5b5.releaseNotes: - Added config.m4 to package.xml to allow installation via pecl/pear

0.7.5b4.releaseNotes:
- Moved to pecl.php.net
- Fixed a bunch of ugly memory leaks
- Fixed bug in MogileFS::connect()
- Renamed MogileFsClient back to MogileFS

summary: PHP client library to communicate with the MogileFS storage
